artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige III; Publisher: Iseya Kisaburō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; trains on two tracks with an open air train station with figures in Western and Eastern dress; predominately red, black and blue; sheets affixed together
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Steam Locomotive and Waiting Area at Tokyo Shiodome Station
